name: Sage
bio: The stronghold of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes. Able to revive fallen friends and stave off aggressive pushes, she provides a calm center to a hellish fight.

skills.name: SLOW ORB
skills.info: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

skills.name: HEALING ORB
skills.info: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

skills.name: BARRIER ORB
skills.info: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall. ALT FIRE rotates the targeter.

skills.name: RESURRECTION
skills.info: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.
